p: The root heartwood of F. adenophylla was obtained from various regions of the University of Peshawar, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan, in December 2012. The identification of plant specimens was performed by Dr. Muhammad Ilyas University of Swabi KP, Pakistan. The voucher specimen number UOS/Bot761 was kept at the Herbarium University of Swabi, KP, Pakistan.
